Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: 90/90 Hip Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with both legs bent at 90-degree angles and lean forward to stretch the hips.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Standing Hip Circles
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lift one leg and move it in circular motions to mobilize the hip joint.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Deep Frog Pose
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Spread knees wide apart and sit back to stretch the inner thighs and hips.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Hip Flexor Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Step into a lunge position and push your hips forward to stretch the hip flexors.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Glute Bridges
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lie on your back, lift your hips, and squeeze the glutes at the top.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Pancake Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with legs wide apart and lean forward to stretch the hips and hamstrings.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Butterfly Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with the soles of your feet together and press your knees towards the ground.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Lying Hip Rotations
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lie on your back, bend your knees, and drop them side to side to mobilize the hips.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Seated Straddle Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with legs wide apart and lean forward to stretch the inner thighs and hips.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Standing Knee to Chest
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Stand and pull one knee towards your chest to activate hip flexors.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Standing Hip Openers
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lift one knee and rotate it outward in a controlled motion.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Wall-Assisted Hip Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lie on your back with your legs against a wall and slowly let them widen.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Couch Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Place one foot on a couch or wall behind you and lower into a deep hip flexor stretch.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Seated Piriformis Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Cross one ankle over the opposite knee and lean forward to stretch the hip.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Dynamic Lunge to Hamstring Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Move between a deep lunge and a hamstring stretch dynamically.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Cossack Squat Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Shift your weight side to side into a deep lateral squat.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Lying Figure-Four Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Lie on your back, cross one ankle over the opposite knee, and pull towards your chest.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Pigeon Pose
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Bring one leg forward and extend the other backward to stretch the hips and glutes.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Hurdler Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with one leg extended and the other bent back to stretch the hips and quads.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Bear Sit Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit with knees bent and feet flat, pressing knees outward for a deep hip opening.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Quadruped Hip CARs
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: On all fours, move one knee in a controlled circular motion.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Deep Squat Hold
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit in a deep squat position to stretch and strengthen hip mobility.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Fire Hydrant Circles
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: On all fours, lift your leg to the side and rotate in circles.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Frog Rockbacks
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Sit in a frog stretch position and gently rock forward and back.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Reverse Lunge with Reach
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Step into a reverse lunge while reaching overhead to stretch the hip flexors.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Standing Lateral Leg Swings
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Swing one leg side to side to loosen up the hip joints.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Arch and round your back to mobilize the spine and hips.

Hip Mobility & Flexibility.name: Hip Flexor Pulse Stretch
Hip Mobility & Flexibility.description: Hold a deep lunge position and pulse gently to increase range of motion.
